paragraphs.body: This is the project discussion page for the Fanon Illustrator Insignia.
paragraphs.text: This is the project discussion page for the Fanon Illustrator Insignia.

paragraphs.body: I, Fruipit, created this page because we needed it. Well, I need it, specifically. I think it would be useful in case any member needs to contact another about a serious issue, or the like.
paragraphs.text: I, Fruipit, created this page because we needed it. Well, I need it, specifically. I think it would be useful in case any member needs to contact another about a serious issue, or the like.

paragraphs.body: I, Fruipit, am resigning. I know I didn't get an opportunity to complete any illustrations, but I recently found out that I belong to too many usergroups, and seeing as how I am least active in this one... Sorry, folks Frui (🌹 • 🐝 • 🐝🐝) 10:18, July 21, 2012 (UTC)
paragraphs.text: I, Fruipit, am resigning. I know I didn't get an opportunity to complete any illustrations, but I recently found out that I belong to too many usergroups, and seeing as how I am least active in this one... Sorry, folks Frui (🌹 • 🐝 • 🐝🐝) 10:18, July 21, 2012 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: I'm very sorry to say that I can no longer be a part of the FII. I got a flood of requests and I just can't keep up with them if I get any more. If people need me to illustrate, they know where to find me, but I just can't throw myself out there as if I have enough time to satisfy everyone. I'd like to restrict my illustration to private requests. Thank you and sorry!
paragraphs.text: I'm very sorry to say that I can no longer be a part of the FII. I got a flood of requests and I just can't keep up with them if I get any more. If people need me to illustrate, they know where to find me, but I just can't throw myself out there as if I have enough time to satisfy everyone. I'd like to restrict my illustration to private requests. Thank you and sorry!

paragraphs.body: Okay, this has been a while coming. I initially rejoined to help myself with my drawing skill, and to have one request is a little disheartening. I will complete it (it's rather interesting, eh?) however with the recent addition of the fanonbenders duties, plus the still-pending FRS, I think it's pointless to remain a member when, in all honesty, I have no drive for this at the moment. It feels... unconstructive. Thanks! Frui (🌹 • 🐝 • 🐝🐝) 22:57, July 29, 2013 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: It's been so hard time when I can't manage my time to do my school stuffs, the wiki, and my own life.  I'm really sorry and as we've talked (It's not necessary to say "we", as you guys did, I didn't realize that until I open the e-mail, sorry for that too), I have to quit.  All of the list will be done as soon as I finish them, I'm really apologize to have my own. . . Not constructive.  Once again, sorry. AcerEvan ( Contributions · )  14:21, August 15, 2013 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: I sincerely can not in good conscience continue to be part of the FII. Art for me is a hobby, I like to do it because it is fun and a stress reliever, but being part of the FII has taken something that I found enjoyable in the past and turned it into something unenjoyable for me. I can't keep up with the pressure and responsibilities of being an FII member. On top of this, being part of the group puts additional stress on me when I already have school, family, finances, medical issues, and work to contend with—and those things need to come first. Very sorry. Kugumi (wall • fanon) 00:45, September 1, 2013 (UTC)
